section.title: Interrupt Generator Interface (InterruptGeneratorIfc)
section.para: Interface containing a basic Interrupt Generator block as predictable source and execurion check for interrupt simulation.

entry.para: Resets of Registers of Interrupt Generator Interface

section.title: Interrupt Generator Block (InterruptGeneratorBlk)
section.para: This block defines a basic Interrupt Generator block as predictable source and execution check for interrupt simulation. It provides 4 channels to generate 4 interrupt sources.

listitem.para: Generate interrupts at a configurable rate for level triggered interrupt destinations.
Check if interrupts are executed in time.

table.title: Registers or Delegates of Interrupt Generator Block
